line.text: Let not my love be called idolatry
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor my beloved as an idol show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Since all alike my songs and praises be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To one of one still such and ever so
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Kind is my love to-day to-morrow kind
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Still constant in a wondrous excellence
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore my verse to constancy confined
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: One thing expressing leaves out difference
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Fair kind and true is all my argument
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Fair kind and true varying to other words
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And in this change is my invention spent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Three themes in one which wondrous scope affords
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Fair kind and true have often lived alone
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which three till now never kept seat in one
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
